      • hasClaim

        public static boolean hasClaim​(java.lang.String jwt,
                               java.lang.String key)
        Checks if a JWT token contains a claim.
        Parameters:
        jwt - A string, possibly not event a JWT
        key - Key for a claim, e.g., "jti" or "aud"
        Returns:
        True if JWT is a valid JWT and contains the requested claim, false otherwise

      • validateJWT

        Parameters:
        jwt - REQUIRED: The JWT as a String.
